dropsend::DropSendService Class Reference

Dropsend server's API facade, which is used to get or set client's info. More...

#include <dropsendservice.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 DropSendService ()
 Initializes a new instance of the dropsend::DropSendService class.
bool login (const QString &login, const QString &password)
 Attempt to get authentication on server with specified login and password. Gets all information related to the current user and keeps it. Makes user's info available for other operations.
Client * getCurrentClientModel () const
 Gets client's model that contains all client data such as account information, plan's cost etc. If user's info is not available, then returns NULL.
Account * getAccountByUser (int user_id) const
 Gets client's account information by specified user_id. If user's info is not available, then returns NULL.
Plan * getPlanByUser (int user_id) const
 Gets client's plan info by specified user_id. If user's info is not available, then returns NULL.
QList< ReceivedFile * > getReceivedFilesByUser (int user_id) const
 Gets the list of user's received files. If user's info is not available, then returns NULL.
QList< SentFile * > getSentFilesByUser (int user_id) const
 Gets the list of user's sent files. If user's info is not available, then returns NULL.

Detailed Description

Dropsend server's API facade, which is used to get or set client's info.

bool DropSendService::login ( const QString &  login,
const QString &  password 
)

Attempt to get authentication on server with specified login and password. Gets all information related to the current user and keeps it. Makes user's info available for other operations.

Parameters:
login Client's login.
password Client's password.
Returns:
True on success, False otherwise.
